meanings.definition: Having a pointed or sharp peak.
meanings.sent1: The mountain became peakier as we climbed higher.
meanings.sent2: The roof of the house was getting peakier as it reached the top.
meanings.sent3: The peakier mountain looked like a giant triangle in the distance.
meanings.sent4: Her voice reached a peakier pitch as she sang the high notes.
meanings.sent5: The peakier shape of the tree made it stand out against the sky.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of reaching a peak in activity or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The peakier crowd cheered louder as the concert reached its climax.
meanings.sent2: Her excitement grew peakier as she neared the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The peakier noise level indicated that the party was in full swing.
meanings.sent4: The peakier energy in the room was palpable as everyone danced.
meanings.sent5: The peakier colors of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
